mapper.sql: select t.rec_id, t.survey_name, t.survey_date, f.org_name, t.file_id, t.rec_status, t.rec_person, t.rec_time, t.rec_updateperson, t.rec_updatetime, u.nick_name as user_name from d_survey t left join sys_user u on t.rec_person=u.user_name left join d_sys_file_record f on t.file_id=f.id
mapper.select:
where t.rec_status='1'
and t.survey_name like concat('%',#{survey_name},'%')
and t.survey_date like concat('%',#{survey_date},'%')
and t.file_id like concat('%',#{file_id},'%')
